attributes.additional_details:
Cycling is the way forward.
By charging cars properly we will divert trillions
of Great British Churchill pounds for spending in
the local UK economy. The £10/hour minimum
wage and full employment can be here in 2014
because the population will become fitter,
healthier, happier and more productive.

Motorists will pay one pound per mile per litre
of engine capacity to fund Public Transport &
cycle superhighways on every road. Nobody
needs a car and the sooner we get those
deadly cars properly charged the better
for the UK economy as a whole and
the sooner the UK will be OK for all.
